answer1: Our site supports multiple languages. Members can communicate in their desired language.
answer2: Our site aims to promote cultural exchange. Members can make friends from other countries and experience new cultures.
answer3: We prioritize the safety of our members. Our site strictly restricts spam, advertisements, and illegal activities.
answer4: You can always contact us through the user support service. Our team will do their best to resolve your feedback or issues.
answer5: Our site has a real-time translation feature that overcomes language barriers. This allows members to easily communicate with people who speak different languages.
answer6: We strive to protect the personal information of our members. Personal information is securely managed and absolute trust is guaranteed.
answer7: Your feedback is very valuable to us. Feel free to provide feedback, and we will work to provide better services.
answer8: We welcome all members. We respect all members regardless of language, race, gender, sexual orientation, etc.
q1: How can I increase intimacy with my language exchange partner?
a1: To increase intimacy, share each other's interests and hobbies, and meet regularly. Sending congratulatory messages or gifts on birthdays or special days is also a good way. It's important to maintain honest and open communication to build a trusting relationship.
q2: What is the most effective way to find a language exchange partner?
a2: The most effective way to find a language exchange partner is to use language exchange apps or websites. These platforms allow you to set your language and the language you want to learn to find matching partners. You can also find partners through online language exchange communities or social media. Joining groups that share your interests or activities is also a good method.
q3: I want to turn off the camera and mute during a video call.
a3: In the video chat room, click the camera icon below your video screen to turn the camera on and off, and click the microphone icon to mute or unmute the microphone.
q4: How can I resolve difficulties during a conversation with a language exchange partner?
a4: To resolve difficulties during a conversation, consider each other's language level and understanding. If something is unclear, respectfully request clarification. You can also use translation tools provided by language exchange apps or websites to aid mutual understanding. Lastly, maintaining a positive attitude and encouraging each other is important.
q5: What are some commonly used expressions during language exchange with foreign friends?
a5: Common expressions during language exchange include 'What language are you learning?', 'What is your native language?', 'How long have you been studying the language?' etc. Also, expressions like 'Do you understand what I am saying?' are often used to check understanding.
q6: What are some ways to keep conversations with a language exchange partner interesting and beneficial?
a6: To keep conversations interesting and beneficial, discuss various topics and learn about each other's cultures. Sharing videos or photos to guide the conversation with visual materials, and engaging in interactive games or quizzes are good methods. Above all, having a genuine interest in the other's stories with curiosity is important.
q7: Is there a way to add friends during video chat?
a7: In the video chat room, click the + icon below the friend's video screen to add a friend.
q8: I want to communicate with local friends.
a8: The feature to enter your current area and communicate with nearby friends is under discussion. We will inform you of any updates.
